properties.name: jwt.secret
properties.description: Secret used to sign JWTs. When not set, JWT support is disabled.

properties.name: app.frontend.url
properties.description: URL of the frontend application. This is used to generate links in emails and other notifications.

properties.name: jwt.expiry.ms
properties.description: Expiration time for JWTs. This is used to set the expiration time for the JWT token.
